{"id":1002245180,"question_id":50,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690165908,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1002245180/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"41.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        \n        if(n==0)\n            return 1;\n\n        if(n == Integer.MIN_VALUE){  // to avoid Integer overflow\n            x = x * x;\n            n = n/2;\n        }\n        \n        if(n<0){\n            n= -n;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n        \n        if(n%2==0)\n            return myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        else \n            return x * myPow(x*x, (n-1)/2);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
